ygData.subject: Re: Alcohol Tolerance
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes that it, has anyone tried increasing this skill? I mean how drunk do you have to be?
ygData.messageBody:
Yes that it, has anyone tried increasing this skill?

I mean how drunk do you have to be?

> negatives (lowered INT and WIS).
